title: It Had to Be You
description: When 29-year-old Binki Grayson is offered a Christmas bonus by her boss at the office party she didn t imagine he meant a quickie over his desk. Things for Binki just go from bad to worse and by Christmas Day she is not only jobless but boyfriend-less, so when she discovers her late Aunt Vera has left her something in her will she thinks things can only get better. What she doesn t realise is that her inheritance comes with a complication by the name of William Ellis. A mishmash of misunderstandings, sex-shop escapades, high finance and a blooming romance make It Had to Be You another hilarious romantic comedy by the uproarious Lynda Renham.
author: Lynda Renham
